title: Catevika Web Dev
description: Your custom website quote in just a few clicks! Catevika, a web developer based in Paris, France, takes care of everything, from design to launch. Everything's under control, and the world is yours, with no limits!

NotFoundPage.text: Ooops! It seems that you've stumbled upon a page that doesn't exist.

FooterTexts.quote: You can't wait until life isn't hard anymore before you decide to be happy.

HomePage.title: Your tailor-made website in just a few clicks!

AboutPage.aboutMe: My name is Dominique Bello and I'm French. I live and work in Paris. Since I got married Italy has been my adopted country.
AboutPage.aboutMe2: I've been a dedicated frontend web developer for 4 years. I make websites to reflect the unique personality of my customers' brands.
AboutPage.aboutMe3: As a project manager in FMCG marketing, I've always enjoyed continuous learning and problem-solving. For over 15 years, I worked with international teams of developers to launch online surveys, whether B&B or BtoC. About 4 years ago, I decided to broaden my horizons and trained as a self-taught web developer.
AboutPage.aboutMe4: Today, I can finally reconcile my passion for web development with my professional goals.
AboutPage.languages: In addition to French, my mother tongue, I also speak English and Italian. I particularly used English in my previous experiences, and almost every day since to acquire new skills in web development.
AboutPage.name: Where does the pseudonym 'Catevika' come from?
AboutPage.cattivik: Ever heard of Cattivik, a mischievous character from an old Italian comic strip?
AboutPage.catevik: Well, thanks to a facetious typo, my husband's pseudonym became Catevik.
AboutPage.catevika: As his wife, I did'nt looked any further for mine!
AboutPage.seahorseSymbol: What about the steampunk* seahorse symbol?
AboutPage.seahorse: The seahorse is often associated with:
AboutPage.hippocampus: The hippocampus is also a brain structure that plays a central role in cognition, memory, learning and spatial orientation. Its characteristic curved shape has been associated with the seahorse-monster of Greek mythology.
AboutPage.note: * A design style that combines historical elements with anachronistic technological features inspired by science fiction. I'm a die-hard fan of this explosive style!

id-1.text: Seahorses are known for their monogamous mating habits and span pair bonds, which has made them a symbol of loyalty and commitment.

id-2.text: Seahorses are slow-moving creatures and take their time to get where they are going. This has made them a symbol of patience and perseverance.

id-3.text: Seahorses have an amazing ability to navigate through the ocean current and survive in harsh conditions. This has made them a symbol of strength and resilience.

id-4.text: Seahorses have a unique shape that makes them very recognizable. This has made them a symbol of creativity and uniqueness.

id-5.text: Seahorses have a long snout and a curved body that gives them an unusual balance. This has made them a symbol of balance and harmony.

Services.title1: Ready to launch your online presence?

id-1.title: I create your showcase site
id-1.text1: Let me design a stunning website that perfectly reflects your brands identity and story
id-1.text2: Attract your ideal audience and stand out in the online world

id-2.title: I create your service site
id-2.text1: Let me simplify your business with a dedicated site for your services
id-2.text2: Streamline customer contacts, showcase your expertise and increase conversions

id-3.title: I take care of your sites makeover
id-3.text1: Let me ensure your existing sites are compatible with the latest technologies for optimal performance and user experience
id-3.text2: Breathe new life into your outdated website

id-4.title: I offer scalable Solutions
id-4.text1: Let me optimize your React front-end to ensure your websites perform flawlessly, even under heavy load

id-5.title: I boost your efficiency
id-5.text1: Let me free up your time by outsourcing some of your React tasks to me
id-5.text2: Focus on your core strengths while I ensure a robust and efficient front-end

id-6.title: Long-Term Support
id-6.text1: Let me keep your React front-end websites secure and up to date, so they're always up and running
id-6.text2: Choose the maintenance and support package tailored to your needs

id-1.title: Genuine commitment
id-1.text: As a self-taught developer, I approach each project from a unique point of view that adapts in every way to your requirements

id-2.title: React Expertise
id-2.text: I leverage the power of React to create stunning and user-friendly websites that engage and convert

id-3.title: Customer focus
id-3.text: I partner with you to understand your vision and translate it into a website that exceeds expectations

id-4.title: Pixel-Perfect Craftsmanship
id-4.text: every element, from design to code, is carefully crafted with meticulous attention to detail

id-5.title: Full cooperation
id-5.text: open communication and collaboration are at the heart of every project

id-6.title: Multilingual Magic
id-6.text: speak French or Italian? No problem! I can also communicate and collaborate seamlessly in both languages

id-7.title: Continuous Learning
id-7.text: the digital world is ever-evolving, and I stay ahead of the curve to offer the best solutions
